title: 建议@JSONField能加notNull属性
body:
出现过一次线上事故，整个JSON串被另一种JSON串替换了，导致转换成JavaBean时，JavaBean的属性都是null（JavaBean不为null，但属性全是null，如果让业务方手动校验每个属性值，这是灾难性的），希望@JSONField中能加入null校验的功能，比如notNull属性，一旦转换，如果我在JavaBean中配置了注解的这个属性，但转换的值为null，那么就抛异常。

这是一个很实用的功能。

title: Map should fill null values only when set WriteMapNullValue
body: make it more compatible to previous versions.

title: versions difference between 1.2.5 and lastest
body:
There is a running difference in SerializerFeature:

```java
public static final int WRITE_MAP_NULL_FEATURES
            = WriteMapNullValue.getMask()
            | WriteNullBooleanAsFalse.getMask()
            | WriteNullListAsEmpty.getMask()
            | WriteNullNumberAsZero.getMask()
            | WriteNullStringAsEmpty.getMask()
            ;
```

The lastest version will take WriteMapNullValue, WriteNullBooleanAsFalse, WriteNullListAsEmpty, WriteNullNumberAsZero, WriteNullStringAsEmpty as **WriteMapNullValue** while old version take SIMPLE WriteMapNullValue.

This will result different output when we set WriteNullStringAsEmpty with no WriteMapNullValue setted.
Nulled fields will be skipped in old versions but they will be "null" in newer versions.

Does it make sense?

title: 关于空对象序列化成｛｝
body: 请大神回复下，最近遇到了一个头疼的问题。我们公司移动端要求我返回的json ，当对象中的所有属性值都是空时返回两个大括号，当对象中某个别字段属性值为空时必须返回该字段并且值为空字符串。我在处理的时候总是只能满足其中之一，不能两全，求大神帮助！

body: isXXX的字段，get方法习惯性写成isXXX(),但是fastjson不支持这种常用习惯，解析不到，必须使用getIsXXX()方法，建议可以兼容下isXXX()这种写法

body:
fastjson版本：1.2.47

这个在jackson中，dto的字段声明为`java.util.Date`类型，是可以进行序列化/~~反序列化~~的

title: Json format identification error
body:
FastJSON version: 1.1.68.android, 1.1.64.android  and 1.1.62.android, other versions did not try.

This is a JSON string (not formatted for easy copy testing): 
```
{"data":{"id":32667,"user_id":758,"shop_id":1,"name":"按摩卡","cid":297,"cat_name":"其他","seller_cids":"1784","price":1,"market_price":39900,"pic_url":"http://mamaqunaer.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/user/758/42CeTiJaN5.jpg","qrcode_url":"http://mamaqunaer.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/qrcode/item/00b6ad034a7f7cd5d5cf46c3168ac50f.png","sold_quantity":6,"quantity":92,"is_recommend":1,"baby_gender":"1,2,3","baby_age":"1,2,3,4,5,6,7","score":"4.0000","status":1,"sort_order":100,"created_at":1521691842,"updated_at":1521705147,"consume_times":10,"expired_type":1,"expired_value":10,"contents":[{"id":"11","shop_id":"1","name":"小佳按摩","pic_url":"http://mamaqunaer.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/user/758/w6cdFiDkS5.jpg","price":"1","desc":"这是一家技术很好的洗浴中心","comment_count":"2","score":"4.0000","status":"1"},{"id":"33","shop_id":"1","name":"小丽按摩","pic_url":"http://mamaqunaer.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/user/758/zWPQhJJz4h.jpg","price":"1","desc":"大飞","comment_count":"0","score":"0.0000","status":"1"}],"is_collected":0,"imgs":[{"url":"http://mamaqunaer.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/user/758/42CeTiJaN5.jpg","position":0}],"commentStat":{"avg_score":"4.0000","score1_count":0,"score2_count":0,"score3_count":1,"score4_count":1,"score5_count":1,"total_count":3},"desc":""},"code":200,"message":"OK","success":true}
```

Here is the stack information at the time of the error:  

![qq 20180323110129](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13534988/37809339-ce8396fc-2e89-11e8-8b10-bff9dc1594c6.png)

```text
at com.alibaba.fastjson.parser.JSONLexer.scanSymbolUnQuoted(JSONLexer.java:953)
at com.alibaba.fastjson.parser.JSONLexer.scanSymbol(JSONLexer.java:740)
at com.alibaba.fastjson.parser.JavaBeanDeserializer.deserialze(JavaBeanDeserializer.java:594)

at com.zhimore.mama.base.http.EntityRequest.parseEntity(EntityRequest.java:33)
at com.zhimore.mama.base.http.EntityRequest.parseEntity(EntityRequest.java:21)
at com.zhimore.mama.base.http.AbstractRequest.parseResponse(AbstractRequest.java:141)
```

----

This is some of the main test code:
```java
String json = ...;
JSONObject jsonObj = JSON.parseObject(json);
String dataJson = jsonObj.getString("data");
XXXInfo info = JSON.parseObject(dataJson, XXXInfo.class); // Here is an error.
```
**Note:** Due to business reasons, data needs to be parsed separately. Is it misused by me?

title: 关于Bean序列化与反序列化Map<String,String>中属性Date类型值为1970年前的问题能否优化？
body:
` Map<String,String> hash = JSONObject.parseObject(JSON.toJSONString(bean), new TypeReference<Map<String, String>>(){});`
方法可以将Bean序列化成Map<String,String>。

`JSONObject.toJavaObject((JSONObject)JSON.toJSON(hash),clazz);`
方法反序列化成Bean时，如果属性类型为Date值为1970年以前时间时，会报序列化失败。看了下是com.alibaba.fastjson.util.TypeUils类中castToDate方法第307行代码针对format的处理有些问题，不支持“--355132800000”字符串的处理。

建议307行判断条件改为： if(strVal.indexOf('-',1) != -1){

title: 字节数组toJSONString后变成字符串了，那如何从这个字符串转回来呢？
body:
我现在把一个字节数组通过JSON.toJSONString(byte[])转成字符串了。我稍微看了下源代码，发现fastjson自动把字节数组做了base64处理，然后输出的是"a9P+vzf/B/9D4AEQZYAH/wAAAAA="这样的。

但是我想把它转回来又改怎么处理呢？也没找到base64解码的方法。

```java
	at org.apache.tomcat.util.threads.TaskThread$WrappingRunnable.run(TaskThread.java:61)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
```


使用  SerializeConfig.getGlobalInstance().setAsmEnable(false) 后正常输出

代码如下

```java
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/members")
public class MemberController {
//    static {
//        SerializeConfig.getGlobalInstance().setAsmEnable(false);
//    }
    @Resource
    MemberBasicMessageMapper memberBasicMessageMapper;

 
    @GetMapping
    public List<MemberBasicMessage> list(@RequestParam Integer now, @RequestParam Integer size){
        List<MemberBasicMessage> list = memberBasicMessageMapper.selectAll();
        System.out.println(JSON.toJSONString(list));
      return list;
    }
}
```

title: 在kotlin  使用TypeReference的fastjsonframework不能解析项目实体类
数字格式转换时如何关闭自动类型适配
请问SerializerFeature.DisableCircularReferenceDetect循环引用有什么作用吗？
body: 默认开启循环引用性能比关闭低了很多。

title: LocalDateTime和Date默认返回的json数据类型不一致
body: fastjson里面Date数据类型默认返回的是时间戳，LocalDateTime默认返回的是一个时间字符串。由于JDK8出来后，大多会用LocalDateTime来替代Date，替代后发现返回的不一致，建议LocalDateTime默认的返回和Date默认返回数据类型保持一致，都默认为时间戳。

title: fastjson的android版本JSONObject取值能否不抛异常
body: Android的org.json里面的JSONObject有一个optString的方法，比如key不存在是不抛异常，直接返回空值，但是fastjson里面没找到对应的方法，这样的话对json对象进行手动解析时只有个getString可以用，服务器下发的数据缺少字段就会报异常，非常影响流程，只能自己加个函数进行过渡处理

title: String解析为JSONObject，特别是含嵌套结构时，字段名如何大小写不敏感？
body:
我知道这很操蛋，但某运营商研究院的规范就是这么脑残，非得支持不敏感。

仅一层json结构时好处理，如下代码，利用commons-collections中的CaseInsensitiveMap可实现。
```
final TypeReference<CaseInsensitiveMap<String, Object>> typeReference = new TypeReference<CaseInsensitiveMap<String, Object>>(){};
CaseInsensitiveMap<String, Object> test = JSON.parseObject("", typeReference);
```

但涉及多层json结构时，嵌套对象又都解析为JSONObject里默认的HashMap或LinkedHashMap，它们是大小写敏感的。

想问fastjson有没相关api，可以自定义JSONObject中Map的类型为CaseInsensitiveMap？

title: 建议ASMDeserializerFactory中一段代码 ASMDeserializerFactory.class.getPackage().getName();修改为ASMDeserializerFactory.class.getName(),因为在一些情况下会出现null

```java
@Data
public class TestDateClass{
    String name;
    LocalDateTime testDateTime;
}
```

```java
    @Test
    public void testEnum() {
        String test = "{\"name\":\"test\",\"testDateTime\":\"2017-12-08 14:55:16\"}";

        //success
        logger.info(JSON.toJSONString(JSON.parseObject(test, TestDateClass.class), SerializerFeature.PrettyFormat));

        logger.info(JSON.toJSONString(JSON.parseObject(test).toJavaObject(TestDateClass.class), SerializerFeature.PrettyFormat));
    }
```

title: （fastjson-1.2.24）反序列化偶尔获取不到对象
JSONCreator BUG
`SerializerFeature.WriteNullBooleanAsFalse` does not work when asm is disabled and `PascalNameFilter` is applied
Android Studio version detector is misunderstanding the next version
body:
Android Studio version detector is misunderstanding the next version because you are using same artifactId for Java and Android library and just puting different version to both of them, it's better if you split up in 2 artifactId and we don't need to check last version on Jcenter

> A newer version of com.alibaba:fastjson than 1.1.67.android is available: 1.2.40 less... (Ctrl+F1) 
> This detector looks for usages of libraries where the version you are using is not the current stable release. Using older versions is fine, and there are cases where you deliberately want to stick with an older version. However, you may simply not be aware that a more recent version is available, and that is what this lint check helps find.

我们的代码检查器 Pinpoint 报告了一处可疑的空指针解引用，
https://github.com/alibaba/fastjson/blob/fcd2ae7723ddc84191cc9b90b453d58b30c02e2c/src/main/java/com/alibaba/fastjson/util/FieldInfo.java#L349-L378

Sourcebrella Inc.

https://github.com/alibaba/fastjson/blob/fcd2ae7723ddc84191cc9b90b453d58b30c02e2c/src/main/java/com/alibaba/fastjson/parser/deserializer/ThrowableDeserializer.java#L131-L150

这处是真的有潜在问题?，还是 139 行的检查是非必要？

祝好，
Sourcebrella Inc.

title: bugfix:issue-1555 当某个字段有JSONField注解，JSONField中name属性不存在，并且类上有属性转换策略，j…
body: 当某个字段有JSONField注解，JSONField中name属性不存在，并且类上有属性转换策略，json属性名也要用类上的属性名转换策略为为准

title: LocalDateTime 转换为时间戳问题
body:
问题点1、 LocalDateTime 进来的值无法确定其时区,所以此处统一按着系统时区走。
问题点2、 如果设置 SerializerFeature.WriteDateUseDateFormat 时按着 "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss" 进行格式化
问题点3：  如果设置 SerializerFeature.UseISO8601DateFormat 时按着ISO8601的标准 "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss"进行格式化
问题点4:
   1)格式化LocalDateTime时， 默认格式成 时间戳格式，
   2)如设置WriteDateUseDateFormat 按 "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss" 进行格式化
   3)如设置UseISO8601DateFormat 按ISO8601的标准 "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss"进行格式化
   4)如设置WriteDateUseDateFormat、UseISO8601DateFormat 同时设置,则按ISO8601的标准 "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss"进行格式化

title: fastjson调用writeToEx时返回MalformedInputException异常.
body:
有一份gbk的文件csvFile，当使用错误的编码utf-8去解析生成dto后。通过@RestController返回给前端时，出现MalformedInputException异常。
源文件地址：https://github.com/longzl2015/public/blob/master/fea.csv
```
 DwTablePreviewDto tablePreviewDto = new DwTablePreviewDto();
 List<List<Object>> records = new ArrayList<>();
 LineIterator it = null;
 it = FileUtils.lineIterator(csvFile, "UTF-8");
 while (it.hasNext()) {
    String line = it.nextLine();
    readTextFile(line, records);
 }
 tablePreviewDto.setRecords(records);
return tablePreviewDto;
```
异常信息如下：
```
java.nio.charset.MalformedInputException: Input length = 1
	at com.alibaba.fastjson.util.IOUtils.encodeUTF8(IOUtils.java:626) ~[fastjson-1.2.32.jar:na]
	at com.alibaba.fastjson.serializer.SerializeWriter.encodeToUTF8(SerializeWriter.java:414) ~[fastjson-1.2.32.jar:na]
	at com.alibaba.fastjson.serializer.SerializeWriter.writeToEx(SerializeWriter.java:345) ~[fastjson-1.2.32.jar:na]
	at com.alibaba.fastjson.JSON.writeJSONString(JSON.java:798) ~[fastjson-1.2.32.jar:na]
```

title: 大数字通过fastjson序列化的时候报错，比如：4294967284超过了int的最大值，序列化成int的时候保存。java.lang.NumberFormatException: 4294967284
body:
大数字通过fastjson序列化的时候报错，比如：4294967284超过了int的最大值，序列化成int的时候保存。java.lang.NumberFormatException: 4294967284
能不能优化，当数字超过Integer.MAX_VALUE;的时候返回0，或者最大值，fastjson应该添加这样的配置，免得数据错误，整个解析中断。

title: Web应用tomcat部署成功，weblogic 12c部署失败
body:
web应用使用了fastjson，打成war包部署在tomcat上是可以的，但部署在weblogic 12c上出现下面的错误信息：

`####<Nov 17, 2017 10:50:11 AM CST> <Info> <com.sun.jersey.api.core.PackagesResourceConfig>  <AdminServer> <Scanning for root resource and provider classes in the packages:
  com.alibaba.fastjson.support.jaxrs> 
####<Nov 17, 2017 10:50:11 AM CST> <Info> <com.sun.jersey.api.core.ScanningResourceConfig>  <AdminServer> <No root resource classes found.> 
####<Nov 17, 2017 10:50:11 AM CST> <Info> <com.sun.jersey.api.core.ScanningResourceConfig>  <AdminServer> <Provider classes found:
  class com.alibaba.fastjson.support.jaxrs.FastJsonProvider> 
####<Nov 17, 2017 10:50:13 AM CST> <Info> <com.sun.jersey.server.impl.application.WebApplicationImpl>  <AdminServer> <Initiating Jersey application, version 'Jersey: 1.18.1 02/19/2014 03:28 AM'> 
####<Nov 17, 2017 10:50:18 AM CST> <Error> <com.sun.jersey.server.impl.application.RootResourceUriRules>  <AdminServer> <The ResourceConfig instance does not contain any root resource classes.> 
####<Nov 17, 2017 10:50:18 AM CST> <Error> <HTTP>  <AdminServer> <Servlet: "Jersey" failed to preload on startup in Web application: "xx.war".
com.sun.jersey.api.container.ContainerException: The ResourceConfig instance does not contain any root resource classes.
        at com.sun.jersey.server.impl.application.RootResourceUriRules.<init>(RootResourceUriRules.java:99)
        at com.sun.jersey.server.impl.application.WebApplicationImpl._initiate(WebApplicationImpl.java:1359)
        at com.sun.jersey.server.impl.application.WebApplicationImpl.access$700(WebApplicationImpl.java:180)
        at com.sun.jersey.server.impl.application.WebApplicationImpl$13.f(WebApplicationImpl.java:799)
        at com.sun.jersey.server.impl.application.WebApplicationImpl$13.f(WebApplicationImpl.java:795)`

去掉fastjson包的依赖，weblogic就可以成功部署，请问是否是fastjson哪里还需要专门针对weblogic的配置？
